forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low -9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 16F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 17F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will change to a steady rain. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will change to a steady rain. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.
